subject: Business
title: The Semiconductor Supply Chain
description: One-minute skill: The Semiconductor Supply Chain.

hook.text: A single advanced chip requires 1,000+ process steps across 70+ border crossings before reaching your phone.

buildup.text: The semiconductor supply chain is the most complex on Earth: design in the US, fabrication in Taiwan, packaging in.

discovery.text: TSMC in Taiwan produces over 90% of the world's most advanced chips. One earthquake could cripple global tech.

twist.text: The 2021 chip shortage idled $210 billion in auto production. A $1 chip held up $40,000 cars.

climax.text: The US CHIPS Act is investing $52 billion to build domestic chip fabs, reducing dependence on Taiwan.

punchline.text: The most important supply chain in the world runs through a single island.

quiz.question: What percentage of the world's most advanced chips does TSMC produce?
